{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3501513,"name":"","username":"Kirill","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/k/a9a28c/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-04T09:45:51.884Z","cooked":"

Hi, we have had some issues with the Rev migration, when I click enable the Swerve spins for a bit and it doesn’t really drive forward, I am pretty positive it’s the angle and drive config tho I am not sure.

class SwerveModule:
def init(self, module_number: int, module_consts: SwerveModuleConstants):
self.module_number = module_number
self.angle_offset = module_consts.angleOffset
self.consts = module_consts

    self.feed_forward = SimpleMotorFeedforwardMeters(
        Constants.Swerve.driveKS, Constants.Swerve.driveKV, Constants.Swerve.driveKA
    )

    self.angle_motor = SparkMax(self.consts.angleMotorID, SparkMax.MotorType.kBrushless)
    self.drive_motor = SparkMax(self.consts.driveMotorID, SparkMax.MotorType.kBrushless )

    self.angle_motor_config = SparkMaxConfig()
    self.drive_motor_config = SparkMaxConfig()

    self.integrated_angle_encoder = self.angle_motor.getEncoder()
    self.angle_controller = self.angle_motor.getClosedLoopController()

    self.drive_encoder = self.drive_motor.getEncoder()
    self.drive_controller = self.drive_motor.getClosedLoopController()

    self.angle_encoder = CANCoder(self.consts.canCoderID)

    self.last_angle = self.integrated_angle_encoder.getPosition()

    self.desired_state = SwerveModuleState()

    self.config_angle_encoder()
    self.config_angle_motor()
    self.config_drive_motor()

def set_desired_state(
    self,
    desired_state: SwerveModuleState,
    is_open_loop: bool,
    override: bool = False,
):
    desiredState = OnboardModuleState.optimize(
        desired_state, self.get_state().angle
    )

    self.set_angle(desiredState, override)
    self.set_speed(desiredState, is_open_loop)

def reset_to_absolute(self):
    absolute_position = (
        self.angle_encoder.getAbsolutePosition() - self.angle_offset.degrees()
    )
    desired_state = OnboardModuleState.optimize(
        SwerveModuleState(0, Rotation2d.fromDegrees(absolute_position)),
        self.get_state().angle,
        False,
    )

    self.integrated_angle_encoder.setPosition(desired_state.angle.degrees())


def config_angle_encoder(self):
    self.angle_encoder.configFactoryDefault()
    CANCoderUtil.set_cancoder_bus_usage(self.angle_encoder, CCUsage.kMinimal)
    self.angle_encoder.configAllSettings(CTREConfigs.swerveCanCoderConfig)


def config_angle_motor(self):
    # self.angle_motor.restoreFactoryDefaults()
    SparkMaxUtil.set_spark_max_bus_usage(self.angle_motor_config, Usage.kPositionOnly)
    self.angle_motor_config.smartCurrentLimit(Constants.Swerve.angleContinuousCurrentLimit)
    self.angle_motor_config.inverted(Constants.Swerve.angleInvert)
    self.angle_motor_config.setIdleMode(Constants.Swerve.angleNeutralMode)
    self.angle_motor_config.absoluteEncoder.positionConversionFactor(
        Constants.Swerve.angleConversionFactor
    )
    self.angle_motor_config.closedLoop.P(Constants.Swerve.angleKP)
    self.angle_motor_config.closedLoop.I(Constants.Swerve.angleKI)
    self.angle_motor_config.closedLoop.D(Constants.Swerve.angleKD)
    self.angle_motor_config.closedLoop.velocityFF(Constants.Swerve.angleKFF)
    self.angle_motor_config.openLoopRampRate(0.0)
    self.angle_motor_config.voltageCompensation(Constants.Swerve.voltageComp)
    self.angle_motor.configure(self.angle_motor_config, SparkBase.ResetMode.kResetSafeParameters, SparkBase.PersistMode.kPersistParameters)
    self.reset_to_absolute()

def config_drive_motor(self):
    # self.drive_motor.restoreFactoryDefaults()
    SparkMaxUtil.set_spark_max_bus_usage(self.drive_motor_config, Usage.kAll)
    self.drive_motor_config.smartCurrentLimit(Constants.Swerve.driveContinuousCurrentLimit)
    self.drive_motor_config.inverted(Constants.Swerve.driveInvert)
    self.drive_motor_config.setIdleMode(Constants.Swerve.driveNeutralMode)
    self.drive_motor_config.encoder.velocityConversionFactor(
        Constants.Swerve.driveConversionVelocityFactor
    )
    self.drive_motor_config.encoder.positionConversionFactor(
        Constants.Swerve.driveConversionPositionFactor
    )
    self.drive_encoder.setPosition(0.0)
    self.drive_motor_config.openLoopRampRate(Constants.Swerve.openLoopRamp)
    self.drive_motor_config.closedLoop.P(Constants.Swerve.driveKP)
    self.drive_motor_config.closedLoop.I(Constants.Swerve.driveKI)
    self.drive_motor_config.closedLoop.D(Constants.Swerve.driveKD)
    self.drive_motor_config.closedLoop.velocityFF(Constants.Swerve.driveKFF)
    self.drive_motor_config.voltageCompensation(Constants.Swerve.voltageComp)
    self.drive_motor.configure(self.drive_motor_config, SparkBase.ResetMode.kResetSafeParameters, SparkBase.PersistMode.kPersistParameters)

def set_speed(self, desired_state: SwerveModuleState, is_open_loop: bool):
    if is_open_loop:
        percent_output = desired_state.speed / Constants.Swerve.maxSpeed
        self.drive_motor.set(percent_output)
    else:
        self.drive_controller.setReference(desired_state.speed, SparkBase.ControlType.kVelocity)

def set_angle(self, desired_state: SwerveModuleState, override: bool = False):
    # Prevent rotating module if speed is less than 1%. Prevents jittering.
    if (
        abs(desired_state.speed) <= (Constants.Swerve.maxSpeed * 0.01)
        and not override
    ):
        angle = self.last_angle
    else:
        angle = desired_state.angle.degrees()

    if abs(angle - self.integrated_angle_encoder.getPosition()) > 0.6:
        self.angle_controller.setReference(desired_state.angle.degrees(), SparkBase.ControlType.kPosition)
    else:
        self.angle_motor.set(0)
    self.last_angle = angle
